sections.title: Welcome to WineDiary
sections.subtitle: Your Personal Wine Tasting Journal
sections.name: Hero Section
sections.label: Home
sections.content: Explore, Document, and Relish Every Sip with Our Wine Diary App - Perfect for Wine Connoisseurs and Enthusiasts Alike.

images.name: WineDiary Hero Image

sections.title: Discover the Art of Wine Documentation
sections.subtitle: About WineDiary
sections.name: About Section
sections.label: About
sections.content:
WineDiary is designed for wine lovers who wish to document their wine journey. Our app lets you capture every detail of your wine tasting experiences, from vineyard visits to cozy home tastings.

- **Mission**: To make wine journaling easy and enjoyable.
- **Vision**: To be the trusted companion for all wine enthusiasts.
- **Values**: Simplicity, Passion, Community.

images.name: About Background
images.description: Aesthetic background featuring vineyards and wine cellars.

sections.title: Enhance Your Wine Experience
sections.subtitle: Explore Our Features
sections.name: Services Section
sections.label: Features
sections.content:
- **Wine Collection**: Log and review all wines tasted.
- **Tasting Notes**: Note the aromas, flavors, and characteristics of each wine.
- **Winery Visits**: Record visits and keepsakes from vineyards.
- **Personalized Recommendations**: Get wine suggestions based on your documented preferences.
- **Community Sharing**: Share your tasting notes with like-minded wine lovers.

images.name: Feature Icons
images.description: Icons representing each feature: wine bottle, notes, vineyard, recommendation, and sharing.

sections.title: Connect with Us
sections.subtitle: We're Here to Help
sections.name: Contact Section
sections.label: Contact
sections.content:
For support, inquiries, or to provide feedback, connect with us via the methods below:  

- **Email**: support@winediary.com  
- **Phone**: (123) 456-7890  
- **Address**: 1234 Wine Street, WineCity, WineLand  

Or fill in the [contact form](#) and we'll get back to you!

images.name: Location Map
images.description: Map displaying our main office location.

sections.title: Our Community's Voice
sections.subtitle: What They Say
sections.name: Testimonials Section
sections.label: Testimonials
sections.content:
Hear from those who love using WineDiary:  

*"WineDiary has completely transformed how I document my wine adventures. It's intuitive and fun!"*  
— Sarah J., Wine Enthusiast

*"As a wine blogger, WineDiary makes it possible to keep all my tasting notes in one, organized place."*  
— Mark R., Wine Blogger

images.name: Mark's Testimonial
images.description: Photo of Mark during a wine tasting event.
